dedicatedCloud_add_nsx_description_line_: By default, all NSX virtual datacentres (vDC) have an NSX Edge cluster made up of 2 medium NSX Edge clusters. You can then resize the Edges. You must have the necessary resources to resize them, or change their quantity.
You can add NSX Edge nodes on this interface. Youâ€™ll be billed {{ price }} monthly for each vCPU. Discounts may apply depending on your contractual commitment. To find out more, visit our website .
dedicatedCloud_add_nsx_success_banner: Your NSX Edge has been added.
dedicatedCloud_add_nsx_error_banner: Your request to add an nsx file could not be completed: {{error}}. If the error persists, please contact Support
